cmp: 声 (sound/voice/(a measure word, used for sounds)/tone/noise)
几 (small table, almost, a few/how many, how much/how many/several/a few)
mng: chime stones, ancient percussion instrument made of stone or jade pieces hung in a row and struck as a xylophone

exm.mng: musical instrument consisting of a set of chime stones suspended from a beam and struck as a xylophone
